profile.subtitle: Web Developer Creating Interactive and Functional Web Experiences.

items.description: Provides software to veterinary offices to streamline processes and increase efficiency.
responsibilities: Design and development of user interface components using Next.js, React, and MUI.
Data integration and management with PostgreSQL (via Supabase).
Implementation of MaterialUI for consistent design throughout the project.
Development of CRUD operations and data table management.
Code management with Git and GitHub.

testimonies.title: Some Testimonies
testimonies.description: Would you like to know what my colleagues said about me?

items.body: I had the privilege of working with Ignacio at Pawtrics Software, where he demonstrated a strong aptitude for learning and applying React web development skills. Ignacio has an impressive understanding of web technologies and consistently sought to enhance his coding skill set. His proactive attitude and ability to contribute effectively made him a valuable team member. I highly recommend Ignacio to any team looking for a developer with a dedication to quality and growth.
items.name: Kiefer Aland

items.body: Working with Ignacio has been a great experience from day one. He is a very complete developer, with a great emphasis on details and a great ability to solve problems that may arise. He is also a very good coworker, always helping others, either by taking the time to explain concepts that you do not understand or by contributing his vision to the ideas that are being developed.
items.name: Manuel Zarraga

items.body: Having worked with Ignacio for about a year I have seen his growth as a developer. He is someone who will go above and beyond, communicating very well with the team. He also is great at working with his peers in group coding sessions and ensuring there is consistency and quality in the code base. I would recommend him to someone looking to grow their development team.
items.name: Joseph Pisani

items.body: Ignacio is an exceptional Front-End Developer with a unique combination of technical expertise, positive attitude, and a strong work ethic. He is a highly motivated and results-oriented individual who consistently produces high-quality work. I have no doubt that Ignacio would be a valuable asset to your team, not only for his technical skills but also for his collaborative and helpful nature.
items.name: Zachary Roosen

items.body: In the time I've known Ignacio, he's transformed into an outstanding developer. He's not one to settle for mediocrity; instead, he consistently pushes himself to exceed expectations. What distinguishes Ignacio is his engaging nature and relentless pursuit of learning. He approaches every task with humility and a strong work ethic, always striving to expand his knowledge and skills. His dedication ensures a seamless collaboration within the team. If you're seeking a developer committed to continual improvement and fostering teamwork, Ignacio is the ideal choice.
items.name: Pia Walcott

about.title: About Me
about.greeting: I'm Ignacio Figueroa, Web Developer specializing in Frontend Development. I craft digital experiences that forge meaningful connections between technology and users.
about.intro: I leverage React (TypeScript, Next.js) to build intuitive solutions that deliver tangible business value. Driven by challenging projects, I'm currently expanding into Backend Development (Node.js, Express.js, Nest.js) to master the full technology stack. I'm committed to continuous growth and developing projects that make a real difference.
about.collaboration: I thrive in diverse teams, creating innovative products that drive meaningful outcomes. I actively seek opportunities that push my boundaries and contribute to advancing the tech landscape.
